评论详情: It's not quite white. I actually picked it out for a gift from my daughter. I was concerned about the sleeves in the picture and I still have a little concern. I plan to have a seamstress take in the sleeves. The wrist is boxy looking. I love the neckline.  I'm 5 ft 6" and 162#. It long enough to cover my misaligned hips and waist due to scoliosis. I think it would be a little more attractive a tad longer with a curve instead of straight.  It's a perfect casual/dressy shirt. I don't think it's too thick material...not too thin either. It possiblely will wrinkle easy. It is very wrinkled just out of the package.  Edited review: after I wrote this review, I saw photos and I realized that my blouse is not the same on the bottom hem. My hem is sewn straight across, VERY BOXY instead of a nice curve as shown in the photos on here. Also the length isn't as long as the photos show. This is a nice looking blouse except for the unattractive hem.  Unfortunately, I washed it already as it was very wrinkled when I received it. Slight wash and drying caused the heavy wrinkles to smoothe out. It washed nicely.  Since I washed it already, I won't be able to return ot exchange it, nfortunately.

Because of the cuff's circumference it almost covered my hands but then again I am only 5 ft tall: kind of petite. It's not the kind of fabric you could push up the sleeves and they would stay. It's extremely boxy. I have no idea how the photo of the model turned out so nice. Having said all that, it would probably look good under a suit jacket. Mostly because of the fabric .
